item.title: SIP vs PRI Telephone Trunking
item.description:

item.title: Why, Oh Why, PRI?
item.description:
You might know the terms PRI, T1 PRI, Telephone PRI, PRI Trunk, or ISDN PRI, but what do they actually mean, and why choose this service? PRI stands for Primary Rate Interface. It’s part of the ISDN or Integrated Services Digital Network and is a step up from BRI or Basic Rate Interface. Simply put, PRI is a digital line connecting to your PBX phone system. It combines numerous phone lines into a single digital line, leading to cost savings on monthly phone bills...
